title: Cyclone Warning for Odisha Coast
description: A cyclonic storm is expected to cross Odisha coast between Paradip and Chandbali by midnight of 11th August. Wind speed likely to reach 90-100 km/h with heavy rainfall in coastal districts.

title: Heavy Rainfall Warning for Mumbai
description: Extremely heavy rainfall (>200 mm) likely over Mumbai and adjoining districts during next 24 hours. Possible waterlogging and traffic disruption.

title: Heatwave Alert for Rajasthan
description: Heatwave conditions likely to prevail over western Rajasthan districts. Max temperature may exceed 45Â°C. Avoid prolonged exposure to sunlight.
